name: Almighty Dice Lord
description:
Thank you for checking out our game for GMTK2022! We are a team of 3 who worked on this game over the weekend of GMTK2022.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement/Aim

Spacebar - Fire

When your power bar is full you can press "E" to roll the dice and gain a power up (either gaining a heart, faster shooting, or more movespeed)
